name: Pong! (Vincent Reynier)
description:
My first Unity game, completed in early 2019. It's fairly simple, and a bit rough around the edges, but I think still quite fun to play ! The game features 3 modes :

  • Classic : Very similar to the original Pong, a good warm-up for the other modes
  • Double Trouble : Control two paddles at once, either by yourself or with a coop partner. Practice your left/right hand coordination or your social skills !
  • Madness : This one is a bit wild. Give it a try if you're looking for a twist on the traditional 1v1 Pong gameplay.
Controls :

        Left and Right arrows to move the paddle in Classic and Madness, W and S to move the secondary paddle in Double Trouble. Mouse clicks in main menu. Escape to exit a mode and go back to the main menu.

Notes :
  • Reset : if the ball gets stuck for any reason, just wait a couple of seconds and it will be reset.
  • Bonuses in Madness mode :
    • Size (green): expands the size of your paddle for a few seconds
    • Speed (orange) : temporarily makes the ball and your paddle faster 
    • Points (blue) : for the duration, each goal scored grants you 2 points instead of 1.

Thank you for playing, and don't hesitate to leave some feedback in the comments ;)
